text: Tillandsia 'Odin's Genuina' is a natural form of Tillandsia usneoides (Spanish moss) with brown rather than green or yellow petals. It is native to Guatemala and Mexico. ==References== *BSI BCR Entry for Tillandsia 'Odin's Genuina' Category:Bromeliaceae cultivar
title: Tillandsia 'Odin's Genuina'
